messages.text: Hi! I saw your repair request for the laptop screen. I can help with that repair.
Great! What's your estimated timeline and cost?
I can complete it within 2-3 business days. Cost would be around $150 including parts. Can you send me a photo of the damage?
Perfect! I'll send the repair photos now. The screen has cracks on the upper right corner.
Hi Mike
Hi, Eyad
How are you doing?

Hi! I'm interested in your EcoSmart Blender listing. Is it still available?
Yes, it's still available! It's in excellent condition.
Great! Can you provide more details about its condition?
Test
Got it, thanks!
Perfect, I'll handle that.
I can help you with your phone battery replacement. What model is it?
It's an iPhone 12. The battery drains very quickly.
I can replace it for $80. The repair takes about 1 hour.
That sounds good! When can you do it?
David???

Hi! I'm interested in your vintage painting. Is it authentic?
Yes, it's certified authentic from the 1950s.
That's amazing! What's your asking price?
I can offer $500 if that works for you.
I can fix your PS5 controller. What's the issue?
The left stick drifts constantly.
I can replace the stick module for $40.
Hello! I have a vintage watch that might interest you.
I'd love to see it! Can you send photos?
Sure! I'll send them right now.
I can help with your TV screen repair. What size is it?
It's a 55-inch Samsung. The screen has a crack.

I have Spider-Man #1, X-Men #1, and many more!
All in mint condition!
Interested?
